survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Car Wash Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their satisfaction with car wash services, identifying areas for improvement and strengths.

questions.question_text: How often do you use car wash services?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple frequency scale to gauge customer engagement levels.

script.question_text: How often do you use car wash services?

questions.question_text: Which type of car wash service do you typically use?
questions.client_notes: Helps identify popular service types and potential gaps in offerings.

script.question_text: Which type of car wash service do you typically use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the car wash service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the car wash service?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a car wash service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key decision-making factors.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a car wash service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving our car wash services.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving our car wash services.
